domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: CNN Tonight
entity.description: Veteran journalist Don Lemon anchors an hourlong prime-time show bringing facts, insight and analysis to the day's biggest news stories. There's candid conversations without talking points or spin, and late-breaking news that becomes tomorrow morning's headlines.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @CuomoPrimeTime @ChrisCuomo Thank you so much Chris Cuomo for your update on Coronavirus Covid_19. Watching you this morning on CNN giving an insight on the symptoms. Wishing you and your wife quick recovery. Respect!
